name: Pong for Yourself
description:
A Pong game but your opponent is you

I made this game as a challenge for myself to write a game in one day so expect some bugs.

wait I come here for a survival game

it's still a survival game, you have to hit the ball to survive so you won't get a Game Over screen :)

NO, IT DOESN'T CONTAIN ANY MYSTERY LIKE OTHER GAMES DO
DON'T WASTE YOUR TIME

Only available for Windows, at least for now
made with raylib
